actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide survivor annuities to subsequent spouses of certain additional classes of deceased annuitants who died after making available survivor annuities for previous spouses at time of retirement, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment of survivor annuities to subsequent spouses of specified additional classes of deceased annuitants who died after making available survivor annuities for previous spouses at time of retirement from the Federal service. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 834(b)).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide survivor annuities to subsequent spouses of certain additional classes of deceased annuitants who died after making available survivor annuities for previous spouses at time of retirement, and for other purposes.
